duplicateGameName: Game with that name already exist
userGamesLimitReachedLong: You have already created {gameLimit} games. To create new game, remove any of your old games, transfer any of your game to other player.
userGamesLimitReached: You already created {gameLimit} games, remove any of your old games

name.label: Game name
name.info: Game name must be unique, be between 3 and 128 characters long, and use only alphanumeric characters, dashes, underscores and spaces
name.Size: Game name must be between 3 and 128 characters long
name.Pattern: Game name must use only alphanumeric characters, dashes, underscores and spaces

privacy.label: Game privacy
privacy.info: Use private for invitation only, password for password protected games or public for games available for everyone

playerNumber.label: Number of players
playerNumber.info: Maximum number of players in game

mapSize.label: Map size
mapSize.info:
Size of map: 
 XS: 200 provinces 
 S: 400 provinces 
 M: 600 provinces 
 L: 800 provinces 
 XL: 1000 provinces
